page.title: 05A POLICEMAN'S DAY,BROMSGROVE
page.content: {Local beat officers}were re-introduced in our area 2yrs ago. Both patrol on a {bicycle,}mainly to prevent crime by being seen and known by residents. An {8hr shift}is worked- 8am-4pm, 4pm-12pm - to suit the area.At the start of the shift he{radios the station}to report for duty, to take messages and receive instructions. He {visits the station once during the shift, usually first thing.He makes a special effort to get to know local adults and children by stopping for a chat. His{blue uniform ensures recognition. He {visits local {schools}so that the children-adults of the future- grow to respect the police and law and order. He aims to{protect {life and property, prevent and detect {crime,maintain order and assist in the {prosecution of offenders.}On the late shift he{checks schools,shops,building {sites}etc{for damage and break-ins.
